Texts.Eng:
Evolved in the depths of a Penumbral world, the Nightar dislike light intensely. They are able warriors and capable spies.

^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Poison

^orange;Environment^reset;:

  ^red;Light^reset;: Reduces ^red;Energy, Health, Physical Resistance and Damage^reset;. Cancels ^red;Drain effect^reset; of attacks.
